name: Battle Mods
description:
Every level you'll recieve different modifiers at random that will affect the course of the round across 3 possible stage layouts. A set of up to 30 different mods can be applied: their effects can be positive, negative or anything in between.
Survive against all adversities to reach a hi-score!

Every run of this game is personalized.

Controls:

WASDMovementMouse (Left Click)Aiming (Shooting)EscPause/Show explanations for current modsSpacebarContext-sensitive interaction

Details:

This game was originally intended for submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020, with the theme: "Out of control". It was made in a little over 48 hours.

You only need to download the "Executable" file to run the game, the "Source" is available for anyone wanting to see how the game works in GameMaker.
